import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Link, Redirect } from "react-router-dom"; export class Header extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { menus: [ { pageName: "Home", path: "/", active: true, protected: false }, { pageName: "Login", path: "/login", active: false, protected: false }, { pageName: "Logout", path: "/logout", active: false, protected: false }, ], login: localStorage.getItem("token") ? true : false, }; this.logout = this.logout.bind(this); this.menuClick = this.menuClick.bind(this); } menuClick(e){ this.setState({ menus: [...this.state.menus] }) } logout() { localStorage.removeItem("token"); this.setState({ login: false }); } render() { return (
    {this.state.menus.map((obj, index) => (
  • {obj.pageName}
    • ))}
  • Shop
    • Shop Category
    • Product Details
    • Product Checkout
    • Shopping Cart
    • Confirmation
  • Blog
    • Blog
    • Blog Details
  • Pages
    • Login
    • Tracking
    • Elements
  • Contact

  • Logout
    • ) : (
  • Login
    • )} */}
); } } export default Header;
